description:
Ultra-distance runs demand ultra-comfortable shoes. The waterproof Spin Ultra trail running shoe has more cushion than other shoes in their trail line to keep your feet happy on soggy, high-mileage days. The Sock-Fit™ upper keeps you locked in, and the TPU insert keeps you stable on uneven terrain. A grippy rubber sole provides reliable traction wherever your run takes you.

  • Mesh upper is highly breathable with micro-nubuck overlay for durability
  • Sock-Fit™ LW construction provides a snug and secure fit
  • Gore-Tex Invisible Fit lining keeps feet dry
  • TPU toe cap protects shoes and toes from trail bumps
  • EVA midsole for cushion and energy return
  • Anti-torsion TPU insert stabilizes feet
  • Vibram® MegaGrip Litebase for lightweight grip on wet and dry surfaces
  • 4mm studs provide traction in loose terrain
name: Scarpa Spin Ultra Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Men's
